name: The Time My Friends Thought I Died
name_original: The Time My Friends Thought I Died
description:
What if one day you woke and all your friends believed you had died? There's a strange and foreboding presence surrounding you. Can you solve the mystery before it's too late?

Hi, I'm Lumicakery and this is my first entry into the game development scene. Please leave a comment on your overall impressions or suggestions, and support me for future development! (p.s. there may still be some bugs.)
